{% block action %}Import Snippets{% endblock %}

{# Blueimp makes this go #}

This form accepts a CSV file which should have the following headings: title, body, and tags. Tags are comma-separated. Categories is currently accepted as a synonym for tags. The body column is imported as plain text. Any additional headings are politely ignored. Please note that duplicates are not detected. If you import duplicates you may need to remove them manually.
